ThingDef.label: advanced endoskeleton stimulator
ThingDef.description: An advanced torso implant that stimulates the overall muscles so they can operate at maximum performance. Requires archotech implants surgery research before installing.

ThingDef.label: advanced muscle stimulator
ThingDef.description: An advanced muscle implant that stimulates the overall muscles so they can operate at maximum performance. Requires archotech implants surgery research before installing.

ThingDef.label: advanced joywire
ThingDef.description: An advanced brain implant that stimulates the brain's pleasure centers. It dramatically improves a user's mood without any side effect. Advanced Joywires are illegal on many worlds, and are known for destroying whole cultures. Requires archotech implants surgery research before installing.

ThingDef.label: advanced painstopper
ThingDef.description: An advanced brain implant which inhibits nociception, or pain sensation. While it does allow the user to accomplish more, it turns out pain has a purpose. When you don't feel it, you can get hurt really bad really easily. Can be activated or deactivated according to user will. Requires archotech implants surgery research before installing.

ThingDef.label: advanced builder AI
ThingDef.description: An advanced brain implant that contain AI. Capable to communicate with the user brain and act as a guide for building. Requires archotech implants surgery research before installing.

ThingDef.label: advanced farmer AI
ThingDef.description: An advanced brain implant that contain AI. Capable to communicate with the user brain and act as a guide for farming. Requires archotech implants surgery research before installing.

ThingDef.label: advanced doctor AI
ThingDef.description: An advanced brain implant that contain AI. Capable to communicate with the user brain and act as a guide for doctoring. Requires archotech implants surgery research before installing.

ThingDef.label: advanced miner AI
ThingDef.description: An advanced brain implant that contain AI. Capable to communicate with the user brain and act as a guide for mining. Requires archotech implants surgery research before installing.

ThingDef.label: advanced diplomat AI
ThingDef.description: An advanced brain implant that contain AI. Able to communicate with the user brain and act as a guide for diplomacy. Requires archotech implants surgery research before installing.

ThingDef.label: advanced tamer AI
ThingDef.description: An advanced brain implant that contain AI. Able to communicate with the user brain and act as a guide for taming. Requires archotech implants surgery research before installing.

ThingDef.label: advanced chef AI
ThingDef.description: An advanced brain implant that contain AI. Able to communicate with the user brain and act as a guide for cooking. Requires archotech implants surgery research before installing.

ThingDef.label: advanced hunter AI
ThingDef.description: An advanced brain implant that contain AI. Able to communicate with the user brain and act as a guide for hunting. Requires archotech implants surgery research before installing.

ThingDef.label: advanced labor AI
ThingDef.description: An advanced brain implant that contain AI. Able to communicate with the user brain and act as a guide for advanced unskilled labor. Requires archotech implants surgery research before installing.

ThingDef.label: advanced appetite suppressant
ThingDef.description: An advanced stomach implant that suppres hungry. Requires archotech implants surgery research before installing.
